alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 24 at 2:56AM CDT until March 25 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 5 AM CDT /4 AM MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis. * WHEN...From 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ this morning to 5 AM CDT /4 AM MDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
